name: JANEEV SAMAJIK SANSTHA
briefDescription: Janeev Social institution is one of the leading NGOs in Pune city. It is a non- governmental organization (NGO) and is working in all spheres for the protection of Human Rights for disabled and weaker sections of society. The chairman of the institution is Mr. Madhukar Rambhau Bibwe. He has worked with the Medha Patkar in Narmada Bachao Andolan, in this regard he got imprisonment (jail) three times. He is a human right activist and great social worker, his inner thrust for the upliftment of down trodden people is great.	Janeev NGO was registered on 3rd August 2005 by the Trust Act. The organization also acquired an 80G certificate of Income Tax Act on 29th November 2005. The main office of Janeev Organization is situated at, 125A, Anjana
